{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Corsair |model=Voyager Air |upc=843591039154 |asin=B00B4OCYSM |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=mobile NAS, |fcc_id=PPD-AR5B95, |ic_id=4104A-AR5B95 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |cpu1_brand=PLX Technology |cpu1_model=NAS7825-AABC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-25E:H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=SparkLAN WPEA-153GN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 3.0 to SATA Host Interface;Asmedia;ASM1053;;1;,,, Single Cell Li-ion Battery Gas Guage IC;Texas Instruments;bq2700;;1;,,, 2.5A Dual-Input Single Cell Switch Mode Li-Ion Battery Charger;Texas Instruments;bq24167;;1;,,, 1.8V, 1.8GHz, Differential Broadband Signal Switch;Pericom Semiconductor;PI2DBS6212ZHE;;1;,,, CPLD;Lattice;ispLC4064ZE;;1;,,, 20V P-Channel MOSFET, Alpha & Omega;AON7423;;2;,,, |flags=battery, portable |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=VoyagerAir |default_ssid_regex=^VoyagerAir$ |default_ip=192.168.77.1 }} http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/5472/corsair-voyager-air-500gb-wireless-storage-device-review/index.html
* Battery: Li-ion, 3.7V, 6200mAh * USB 3.0 client based on Asmedia asm1053
According to CPU datasheet: * Booting from HDD without Flash for the lower BOM cost (support of Flash is optional) * Two integrated SATA3G/s ports with RAID0, RAID1, and JBOD support in hardware
